title: Understanding Firewalls
text: A firewall acts as a barrier between a trusted network and an untrusted network. It monitors and controls incoming and outgoing network traffic based on predetermined security rules.

title: Key Function of Firewalls
text: The primary role of a firewall is to protect the network by blocking unauthorized access while allowing legitimate communication.

title: Select the Correct Function
text: Choose the main function of a firewall from the options below.
